verses.text: \w At|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H6256"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w left|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* escaped \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*: \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w rest|strong="H7280"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. Yea \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* thee \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w love|strong="H0157"\w*, \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w drawn|strong="H4900"\w* thee, taking pity \w on|strong="H5921"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* thee \w again|strong="H5750"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H5750"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w*, \w O|strong="H1129"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w of|strong="H1330"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: thou shalt \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w be|strong="H5750"\w* adorned \w with|strong="H3478"\w* thy \w timbrels|strong="H8596"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* shalt \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* \w dances|strong="H4234"\w* \w of|strong="H1330"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* make merry.

Thou shalt \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* \w in|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H5750"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*: \w the|strong="H5750"\w* \w planters|strong="H5193"\w* \w shall|strong="H2022"\w* \w plant|strong="H5193"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w they|strong="H2490"\w* \w shall|strong="H2022"\w* \w not|strong="H5750"\w* gather \w the|strong="H5750"\w* vintage \w before|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H5750"\w* \w time|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w which|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w watchmen|strong="H5341"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*: \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* let \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Sion \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Rejoice|strong="H7442"\w* ye \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* neigh before \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*: \w shout|strong="H7442"\w* ye, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sing|strong="H7442"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Save|strong="H3467"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ends \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w among|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H2030"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w child|strong="H2030"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* she \w that|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w bringing|strong="H0935"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*, \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w company|strong="H6951"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w returning|strong="H7725"\w* hither.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w back|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* mercy: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w through|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* torrents \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w islands|strong="H0339"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w afar|strong="H4801"\w* \w off|strong="H4801"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w scattered|strong="H2219"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* doth \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w flock|strong="H5739"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* mightier \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H3254"\w* praise \w in|strong="H5921"\w* mount Sion: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w flow|strong="H0935"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w good|strong="H2898"\w* \w things|strong="H2898"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* corn, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w increase|strong="H3254"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w watered|strong="H7302"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* hungry \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* shall \w the|strong="H0227"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H8055"\w* \w the|strong="H0227"\w* \w dance|strong="H4234"\w*, \w the|strong="H0227"\w* \w young|strong="H0970"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w and|strong="H2205"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: \w and|strong="H2205"\w* \w I|strong="H0227"\w* \w will|strong="H0970"\w* \w turn|strong="H2015"\w* \w their|strong="H2015"\w* \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* \w into|strong="H2015"\w* \w joy|strong="H8342"\w*, \w and|strong="H2205"\w* \w will|strong="H0970"\w* \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* \w them|strong="H8055"\w*, \w and|strong="H2205"\w* \w make|strong="H8055"\w* \w them|strong="H8055"\w* \w joyful|strong="H8055"\w* after \w their|strong="H2015"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fill|strong="H7301"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w fatness|strong="H1880"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2898"\w* \w things|strong="H2898"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w A|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* high \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w lamentation|strong="H5092"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w mourning|strong="H5162"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Rachel|strong="H7354"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w refusing|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: Let thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* cease \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w reward|strong="H7939"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w work|strong="H6468"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* out \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* here \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w last|strong="H0319"\w* \w end|strong="H0319"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w Hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* captivity: thou hast \w chastised|strong="H3256"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w instructed|strong="H3256"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* young bullock unaccustomed \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* yoke. Convert \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w converted|strong="H7725"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thou didst convert \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* did penance: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thou didst shew unto \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w struck|strong="H5606"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H5162"\w* \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* honourable \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* tender \w child|strong="H3206"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* troubled \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: pitying \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w pity|strong="H7355"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Set|strong="H7760"\w* thee \w up|strong="H5324"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* watchtower, \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee bitterness: \w direct|strong="H7896"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* right \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, wherein thou hast \w walked|strong="H1980"\w*: \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, O \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* thy \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.
